typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Description as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		json_value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source7
Filter1 parse(levelandregistration = json_value ? (code as integer,
		descr as string),
	format: 'delimited',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	columnDelimiter: '|',
	nullValue: '') ~> Parse1
source7 filter(ProductDescriptionID == 3) ~> Filter1
